Reviews.Title: "Icing on the cake" for BR make-over!
Reviews.Author: Barbara Lasky "kneadylady"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my new T.V. I was hesitant to order because there were no reviews on this item, however...it was the right size, the right price, and had everything I wanted, so I took a leap of faith and made the purchase. Set-up was easy and I get a clear, sharp picture and good sound. I'm even receiving more digital channels than I expected from my cable service! There is only one negative comment: When I tried to pull off the advertising sticker from the top left corner of the frame, it left a residue from the adhesive. Otherwise, this has been an excellent choice to complete my bedroom make-over. Oh...and thank you Amazon for the Free shipping offer and quick delivery!

Reviews.Title: Great HD Tv!!!!
Reviews.Author: M. A. Scott "Rock and Classical music fan"
Reviews.Content: I did a review on Amazon of a 22in Sylvania Tv that I thought was this one but I guess it was just one that was similar to this one. You probably shouldn't pay attention to the two 1 star reviews here on this entry. The snow that was showing up  on your HD tv probably had to do with the reception of your cable or satellite as opposed to the tv itself, and as far as the picture quality, you need to tweek the controls a bit because I'm not having problems with mine. With the two 1 star reviews it looks like this isn't a good tv but believe me it's a high quality HD Tv.  Not that Sylvania is the best of all the brands of HD Tv's but for the low price that it sells for it's a terrific set. I'm not sure what the difference is between Sylvania's other 22 inch HD TVs but I'm sure that they're of similar quality and I've seen the reviews of them and they got a 4 and a 1/2 star rating average opposed to the 2 and a 1/2 star average on this one. Don't let the two bad reviews scare you off, this is a very fine quality set which I'm sure you will really enjoy.

Reviews.Title: Terrible color
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "marnop"
Reviews.Content: It sounded good from the one review so I ordered.The specs are good with many connections I need.However, the picture even at full brightness looked like there was a gray filter over it.I even looked for a sheet of film over the screen, but it was real.No of amount of adjustment of the picture would remove the shadows and bad colors.Everything else worked fine with input from satellite box and outside digital antenna.Nice sharp picture but at a 30 degree angle the picture was almost useless.There must be something wrong with only this box.I will be sending it back, thanks to Amazon's excellent return policy.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money.
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: The Sylvania LC225SSX 22-Inch Flat Panel LCD HDTV has an excellent HD picture. It's perfect for a small to medium sized bedroom, like a child's bedroom, or a small apartment. It sits easily on a dresser, cart or small table, yet its 22" screen is wide enough for the picture to be seen well from a distance. It is extremely user friendly. It offers several different screen configurations for height and width. The sound quality is good, and there is an equalizer to allow you to change the bass and treble to your liking. It's a lot of value for its low price.

Reviews.Title: Not worth even one star
Reviews.Author: B Christy "Budsforu"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV in October 2008, and today (August 23, 2009) it died.  It worked a total of TEN MONTHS! I went through the litany of all the things to do to get it to work but it was completely dead.  I called the Syvania help line and they said all they would do is have me take or ship the TV to an "authorized" repair place which is 75 miles from where I live (my expense), pay for the labor (more expense) and they would happily pay for the parts.  When I complained that the labor and shipping charges could cost as much as the TV and the "parts" may only be a loose wire, the man at Sylvania got rude and basicly said that's the options- take it or leave it.  If you buy a TV from Sylvania, you are an idiot!  This TV sucked and the service at Sylvania sucks right along with their TV.  If I EVER buy another thing with the Sylvania name on it, I hope somebody takes me out and shoots me in the head!  They have lousy products and the service is lousy.Mad as hell in West Virginia

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: Eugene D. Savitt "bugman"
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv 2 weeks before it died.  Sylvania replaced the tv after 10 phone calls with a "reconditioned" unit. Broken.  Now trying to get back my money.  I even asked Sylvania if any of their tv's work.  try another brand.

Reviews.Title: Just Ok
Reviews.Author: Arthur
Reviews.Content: Bought ths for a bedroom--Picture quality is a disappointment--not sharp at all.  Sure does not compare to the same size Sharp I purchased a year ago for my kitchen wall.  Sound quality on this is just ok--it does get loud enough, however.  Looks nice & remote is easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: L. Catullo
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV on Thursday and received it the following Thursday.  It has a great picture and remote.  very pleased with TV

Reviews.Title: Sylvania LC225SSX 22-Inch Flat Panel LCD HDTV, Black
Reviews.Author: Kane Ohana
Reviews.Content: The television is just "ok". Several stations come out "snowy" and other stations are ok. If you are looking for a high quality television with a clear picture you may want to consider something else.

Reviews.Title: television
Reviews.Author: julieanna
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent tv and a great price.  The screen is a little small , yet for the price its a great tv for a bedroom or kitchen.

Reviews.Title: This TV is amazing
Reviews.Author: Trevor C. Larsson
Reviews.Content: I love this TV its amazing. The picture quality is perfect. I have had it for 6 months now and played my Xbox and PS3 on it with HDMI and the picture quality is so good, clear and bright. Its also very light and easy to move around. For the price theres no better TV in this size.

Reviews.Title: A true bedroom bargain~
Reviews.Author: Michael Owsowitz
Reviews.Content: Having sold audio and video in boutique stores for many years, and as a dedicated cinephile, I am a picky consumer. I was not interested in investing heavily in my bedroom set. I can only say that video differences between the Sylvania and the cream of class Samsung (at a much higher price, which I A/B'd in the store) are minor if you are using an HDMI or HD source. Sharpness is excellent, color is natural and well-balanced with factory settings, sound is what you'd expect out of teeny speakers but stereo separation, a key factor in a small set, is excellent. Menus are intuitive and there are lots of useful presets and user tweakable sound and video adjustments, though you won't need them much. Off axis image quality drops off dramatically which is to be expected for a sub-$200 device, but is unimportant for a bedside TV. My main system is a 52" Sony SXRD 1020P which is a state of the art picture, and I can only say that I never find myself disappointed by compariosn when I watch a familiar movie on the Sylvania. I would not recommend this set if you are A. going to use component video inputs (the sharpness decreases dramatically) or B. going to use it as a main set in a large room. The remote is well laid out. I've owned mine for a year and a half and had now problems. Highly recommended for the discriminating viewer on a budget. The only improvement I would suggest is a sound levelling feature, since films with a lot of dynamic range (like Batman, etc) can require some volume riding if you're watching them late at night and have neighbors. If you adjust for reasonable sound levels during explosion scenes you'll find dialogue too low.

Reviews.Title: A Very Good Buy!!!!
Reviews.Author: Alexandros M. Collie "bah techie"
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use. The sound is great and the picture on channels that are in HD is great! I would recommended to any one.

Reviews.Title: Got what I paid for
Reviews.Author: Chris Fuller "chf_2258"
Reviews.Content: I'm going to use this in my home office as a PC monitor and TV so it will be a PC monitor most of time. For $250 I can't complain.....so far (bought it today so we shall see).Now, it this was to be used as my main TV/entertainment center I would consider another brand and certainly a larger TV but this TV will meet my needs.

Reviews.Title: Simple and Inexpensive TV
Reviews.Author: Milon E. Hill
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my nephews to play video games.  They absolutely love it.  I have to pry them away from it most of the time.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Jose Bencosme "Red Blaze 80"
Reviews.Content: Good quality unbeatable price i just bought it on black friday and it works like a charm until now recomended to any gamer

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my apartment bedroom so that I could have a HDTV to play my 360. It worked great up until a few months later when the power button on the remote would not turn the TV on. Then the TV started randomly turning the volume down on its own and then when I went to go use the TV-side volume down button, the volume only went up.For $50 more dollars I could've gotten a nicer brand TV without all of the gripes. I will never purchase anything Sylvania except light bulbs ever again.

Reviews.Title: Good quality but no remote control codes avail
Reviews.Author: R. B.
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv. Great price and excellent picture. No problems except that it seems near impossible to find codes to program universal/cable/sat remote controls. Aparently this TV is made by Funsai who also makes TVs for Magnavox, Phillips and others. They use obscure Chinese remote control codes, so no luck programming other remote controls to work this tv. Using one remote to turn tv off/on and volume and a separate remote for channels on your cable box is a pain. Other than that, good tv.

Reviews.Title: Its OK
Reviews.Author: J. D. Rees "exukinsf"
Reviews.Content: Set up is very simple,Price is good for the size,Picture is better than average for a smaller item,sound could be improved somewhat,the main reason for the 3 star rating is that i believe all these type of items should come with the cables required for set up of the unit,having to go and buy all the required cables after getting the item is honestly a pain.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Switzer
Reviews.Content: We bought this tv for our our daughter's bedroom, and worked great for about 8 months.  Then one night she told me her tv wasn't working.  I walked in to this terrible screeching sound and the screen was nothing but dark lines running horizontally.  I figured it was the DVD, so I stopped the DVD and the tv never changed. So I turned the tv off and back on and all I got was a flashing green led power indicator.  I tried unplugging, nothing changed. I usually don't write reviews but I started looking for solutions to this issue, finding hundreds of other complaints just like mine.  I'm am glad however that it wasn't an expensive tv....I believe the old saying that "you get what you pay for" is true.  I have numerous Sony, Samsung, Pioneer, and Yamaha electronics that are over 5 years old with no issues what so ever.
